title: Mana Reinforcement
body:
Mana Reinforcement

Evan left the sparring arena and it was quite simple to guess what he did just after leaving the arena.

Did he test his full power using mana reinforcement in the real life?

Nope!

The first thing he did was to take out his phone and opened the calculator.

Then he used the calculator to see how much money he is going to get.

Since the odds were 1: 5 and Evan betted his entire bank account he earned quite a lot this time.

Evan's eyes released a bright beam of light when he saw the number on the calculator.

510,240.

"I hope this time my break up with poverty will last for the lifetime" Evan muttered and started to walk towards his room.

While betting he provided his bank account number so the winning amount will come into his bank account after some time.

After arriving in his room Evan sat down and once again used mana reinforcement.
